_comments.latitude: Leave as null for automatic IP-based detection, or set to your latitude (e.g., 40.6982)
_comments.longitude: Leave as null for automatic IP-based detection, or set to your longitude (e.g., -74.4014)
_comments.forecast_hours: Hours of weather forecast to use (1-72)
_comments.power_smoothing_factor: Smoothing factor for power changes (0.0-1.0, higher = smoother)
_comments.min_profitable_hashprice: Minimum hash price (USD per TH/s per day) for profitable mining
_comments.optimal_hashprice: Hash price threshold for maximum power operation
_comments.max_power_price_factor: Maximum power increase factor when hash price is high (1.0 = no increase)
_comments.min_power_price_factor: Power reduction factor when hash price is low (1.0 = no reduction)
_comments.enable_profitability_shutdown: Automatically shut down miner when hash price falls below threshold
_comments.shutdown_hashprice_threshold: Hash price threshold for automatic shutdown (USD per TH/s per day)
